name: Soul Link (itch)
description:
This game was made for the "Jame Gam" with a theme of "Highly flammable/explosive" and an special feature "totally normal water" in 5 days. 

You are part of a group of dungeon conquers called the soul corps division and your job is to destroy the red crystals in the dungeon that are spawning monsters but the monsters can not be physically harmed so the only option is to soul link. While soul is linked to enemies the player can go into the totally normal water to reflect flame damage onto the monster but if the soul link is not active the player will burn instead. Use the same method with the soul link to burn / destroy the crystals which are spawning the monsters. Use trap soul link to heal from traps instead of taking damage from them. Destroy 5 crystals and exit through the gold door to win. 

Enjoy.
